languages.text: "Ну разумеется, как же без того, чтобы испортить послевкусие хорошей бойни прокисшим питьем и придурковатыми виршами".

traits.locale_text: "Ну разумеется, как же без того, чтобы испортить послевкусие хорошей бойни прокисшим питьем и придурковатыми виршами".

languages.text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."
languages.original_text: "Ну разумеется, как же без того, чтобы испортить послевкусие хорошей бойни прокисшим питьем и придурковатыми виршами".

traits.locale_text: "Of course it wasn't. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."
"Of course it wasn't. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."
"Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."
"Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."
"Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."
"Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."

languages.text: 「当然そう言うだろうさ。お前はいつだって、鮮やかな虐殺の余韻を、酸っぱい酒と間抜けな詩句で台無しにせずにはいられないからな」
languages.original_text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."

traits.locale_text: 「当然そう言うだろうさ。お前はいつだって、鮮やかな虐殺の余韻を、酸っぱい酒と間抜けな詩句で台無しにせずにはいられないからな」

languages.text: "Natürlich sagt Ihr das. Ihr könnt einfach dem Drang nicht widerstehen, ein gutes Gemetzel durch saure Getränke und tumbe Verse zu entweihen."
languages.original_text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich sagt Ihr das. Ihr könnt einfach dem Drang nicht widerstehen, ein gutes Gemetzel durch saure Getränke und tumbe Verse zu entweihen."

languages.text: « Une réaction prévisible. Vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de gâcher la satisfaction d'un bon massacre avec vos boissons amères et vos vers stupides. »
languages.original_text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."

traits.locale_text: « Une réaction prévisible. Vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de gâcher la satisfaction d'un bon massacre avec vos boissons amères et vos vers stupides. »

languages.text: «Sabía que dirías eso. No te puedes resistir a estropear el retrogusto de una buena matanza a base de bebidas amargas y discursos inanes».
languages.original_text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."

traits.locale_text: «Sabía que dirías eso. No te puedes resistir a estropear el retrogusto de una buena matanza a base de bebidas amargas y discursos inanes».

languages.text: “我就知道你要这么说，你总是忍不住用那些馊饮料和蹩脚的烂诗，破坏大屠杀过后的余韵。”
languages.original_text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."

traits.locale_text: “我就知道你要这么说，你总是忍不住用那些馊饮料和蹩脚的烂诗，破坏大屠杀过后的余韵。”

languages.text: "Aman, ne şaşırdım. Katliamdan sonra ağzımızın tadını mayhoş içkiler ve dangalakça mısralarla kaçırma fırsatını tepmezsin tabii."
languages.original_text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."

traits.locale_text: "Aman, ne şaşırdım. Katliamdan sonra ağzımızın tadını mayhoş içkiler ve dangalakça mısralarla kaçırma fırsatını tepmezsin tabii."

languages.original_text: "Of course you would say that. You simply cannot resist spoiling the aftertaste of a good slaughter with sour drinks and half-witted verses."
